label: Classes
desc: Which classes can learn this spell

label: Spell Level
desc: The level of the spell (this is separate from the player's level), 0 is a cantrip

label: Magic Type
desc: What type of magic the spell is

label: Casting Time
desc: How long it takes the character to cast this spell

label: Range
desc: How far the character can be from the target of the spell

label: Verbal
desc: Boolean - spell requires a verbal incantation

label: Somatic
desc: Boolean - spell requires a precise hand motion

label: Material
desc: Boolean - spell requires a physical object which is consumed

label: Consumed
desc: What type of material is consumed when casting the spell
